scripts.dev: rm -rf public && wasm-pack build --out-dir dist --dev --out-name app && BUILD_MODE=dev webpack
scripts.build: rm -rf public dist && wasm-pack build --release --out-dir dist --out-name app && webpack
scripts.serve: rm -rf public && wasm-pack build --dev --out-dir dist --out-name app && BUILD_MODE=dev webpack && serve -s -p 8080 public

name: folio
description: this web site is FaBomb's portfolio site. I will publish my works and blog posts.
